# IntentWidgetFamily.accessoryCorner

**Case**

A corner widget.

## Declaration

```swift
case accessoryCorner
```

## Discussion

The accessory corner widget can appear as a complication in watchOS.
title: IntentWidgetFamily.accessoryCorner
